Replies.Author: dante
Replies.Content:
Back, foul temptress! Must not….buy….HD….goodness…

The (Super?) Senior Staff is trying to acquire something….expensive. You should save your pennies for delicious ramune and membership fees instead.

Replies.Author: Chris
Replies.Content: Heh, I’ll probably chip in once my next paycheck comes in and I don’t spend it on DDR equipment and PC parts. Can’t believe we’re actually getting one. It’s a long time coming.
